_header: Thine heritage if thou wilt win
_description: The Narrow Path to Heaven — two couplets

CULIi38.Transcription:
Þyn heritage ȝef þou wolt wynneWyþt pyne & wo
                    þou most bygynnePassen þou most by my lyft sydeÞef
                    þou wyl nost wytȝ me to ryde
CULIi38.Note:
Listed as Cambridge University Library Gg.3.8 in Brown  and  Robbins (1943)
XCarleton Fairchild Brown,   and  Rossell Hope Robbins.  
             The Index of Middle English Verse.
         New York: Printed for the Index Society by Columbia University Press,
            1943.
